text.0: to this fair sacrifice to drink the milky draught thou art invoked.
text.1: o agni with the maruts come.
text.2: no mortal man no god exceeds thy mental power o mighty one.
text.3: o agni with the maruts come.
text.4: all gods devoid of guile who know the mighty region of midair.
text.5: o agni with those maruts come.
text.6: the terrible who sing their song not to be overcome by might.
text.7: o agni with those maruts come.
text.8: brilliant and awful in their form mighty devourers of their foes.
text.9: o agni with those maruts come.
text.10: who sit as deities in heaven above the skyvaults luminous sphere.
text.11: o agni with those maruts come.
text.12: who scatter clouds about the sky away over the billowy sea.
text.13: o agni with those maruts come.
text.14: who with their bright beams spread them forth over the ocean in their might.
text.15: o agni with those maruts come.
text.16: for thee to be thine early draught i pour the somamingled meath.
text.17: o agni with the maruts come.
